loginRight.title: Your fast and simple photo editor
loginRight.content: AwesomeIMG helps you compress, convert, crop and resize images easily. Enjoy a full suite of tools to batch edit multiple images online in seconds.

homeFunc: Compress JPG, PNG, SVG, and GIF while saving space and maintaining image quality.
Customize the size by percentage or pixel, and adjust the size of JPG, PNG, SVG, and GIF pictures.
Crop image files by setting pixels. You can crop JPG, PNG, or GIF image files.
Easily batch convert PNG, GIF, TIG, PSD, SVG, WEBP, HEIC or original image files.
Convert JPG image files to PNG or GIF format, and create a GIF animation file with multiple JPG files.
Use words, effects, frames and stickers to make pictures more vivid and interesting. Use simple editing tools to meet your creative needs.
Quickly add image or text watermarks to your pictures. Select typesetting, transparency, and location.
Make funny and creative pictures online in a simple step. Choose your own template, or choose from the most popular templates.
Rotate multiple JPG, PNG or GIF pictures at the same time, and select horizontal or vertical pictures each time!
Convert the webpage in HTML to JPG or SVG. Copy and paste the URL link of the page, and then click to convert it to a picture.
